name: Ghost Robber
description:
Ghost Robber, it is simple isn’t it? Be Rob and Rob the mana! 

* Warning: there might be ghosts. *

Ghost Robber is the next instalment of the world where Rob lives.

This game was made by me, Fantorim the Golden to put a lot of thinks I have learned from development to the test. This where you collect mana has:

• High scores that will get saved

• Difficulty settings

• A sound toggle

• A clear gameplay loop

• Self made art and sounds made using SFXR and beepbox

Some of there things have been seen in my previous two games, and some haven’t, but I am honestly proud about how it turned out.

 

Gameplay:

If you want to play the game, download it or run it in the browser. Select the difficulty you want on the left side of the screen and press play!

Movement can be done via:

• An AZERTY keyboard (ZQSD)

• A QWERTY keyboard (WASD)

• The arrow keys

 To return to the main menu:

• Get Destroyed

• Press Escape

To close the game when you are done playing:

• Press Escape in the main menu

• Press the power button in the bottom right of the main menu

And, just like Press It! credits to Tiny Worlds for the in-game font Thaleah.

If you have any thoughts about the game, please share them in the reactions and I hope you have fun trying Ghost Robber!
